name: TextFrame
description: Represents the text frame for a shape object.

properties.name: textRange
properties.description: Returns or sets the degree of transparency of the specified fill as a value from 0.0 (opaque) through 1.0 (clear). For API not supported shape types  or special fill type with inconsistent transparencies, return null. For example, gradient fill type could have inconsistent transparencies.

properties.name: leftMargin
properties.description: Represents the left margin, in points, of the text frame.

properties.name: rightMargin
properties.description: Represents the right margin, in points, of the text frame.

properties.name: topMargin
properties.description: Represents the top margin, in points, of the text frame.

properties.name: bottomMargin
properties.description: Represents the bottom margin, in points, of the text frame.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment of the text frame.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment of the text frame.

properties.name: horizontalOverflow
properties.description: Represents the horizontal overflow type of the text frame.

properties.name: verticalOverflow
properties.description: Represents the vertical overflow type of the text frame.

properties.name: orientation
properties.description: Represents the text orientation of the text frame.

properties.name: readingOrder
properties.description: Represents the reading order of the text frame, RTL or LTR.

properties.name: hasText
properties.description: Specifies whether the TextFrame contains text.

properties.name: autoSize
properties.description: Gets or sets the auto sizing settings for the text frame. A text frame can be set to auto size the text to fit the text frame, or auto size the text frame to fit the text, or without auto sizing.

methods.name: deleteText
methods.description: Deletes all the text in the textframe.
